messages.subject: Re: Kyle MacLaren and "Sophie"
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hi Kerry! 1.)  Sure, your son can come live with me, (though it s a little cold here right now!) and 2.)  No, sorry, I don t know Kyle!  I have met Joni
messages.messageBody:
Kerry Kibort wrote:
>
> HellO! I had my son in my lap while reading your post
> and he went HAYWIRE when he saw where you're from. You
> see, our favorite Boston Bruin's hockey player is from
> your area! Kyle MacLaren, known dearly to us as
> Sasquatch.
> He would like to know if, 1. he can come live with
> you, and 2. do you know Kyle?
> Kerry
>


Hi Kerry!

1.) Sure, your son can come live with me, (though it's a little cold
here right now!) and
2.) No, sorry, I don't know Kyle! I have met Joni Mitchell's family
though and one of Joni's claims to fame is the fact that she is a proud
"flatlander" from right here; Saskatoon, Saskatchewan!

Sending lots of Saskatchewan sunshine to everyone out there...

Sonia/Sophia
(actually, the Greek form of Sonia is indeed "Sophia")
